name: Product Name 01
desc: This glass has an assertive appearance, with a slim rectangular front and sharp curves. These are for the influential person with confidence and authority. The thin metal rim with flex hinges is ideal for creating a simplistic yet smart look.

store.name: Capitol Optical
location: Blk 231 Bain Street #01-15 Bras Basah Complex, Singapore
252 North Bridge Road #03-08 Raffles City, Singapore
583 Orchard Road #B1-17 Forum The Shopping Mall, Singapore
